abstracts.cdata!:
The Highway Study consists of consultant
            studies to review the present highway administration and
            transport coordination agencies, and the provision of
            technical assistance to implement the recommendations of the
            consultants; feasibility and engineering studies on selected
            roads; and the provision of funds for training overseas of
            selected Korean personnel.
